15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21#include <isc/result.h>
22#include <isc/types.h>
23#include <isc/util.h>
24
25#include <dns/keyvalues.h>
26#include <dns/rdata.h>
27#include <dns/rdatastruct.h>
28#include <dns/types.h>
29#include <dns/zonekey.h>
30
31bool
32dns_zonekey_iszonekey(dns_rdata_t *keyrdata) {
33 isc_result_t result;
34 dns_rdata_dnskey_t key;
35 bool iszonekey = true;
36
37 REQUIRE(keyrdata != NULL);
38
39 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(keyrdata, &key, NULL);
40 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
41 return (false);
42
43 if ((key.flags & DNS_KEYTYPE_NOAUTH) != 0)
44 iszonekey = false;
45 if ((key.flags & DNS_KEYFLAG_OWNERMASK) != DNS_KEYOWNER_ZONE)
46 iszonekey = false;
47 if (key.protocol != DNS_KEYPROTO_DNSSEC &&
48 key.protocol != DNS_KEYPROTO_ANY)
49 iszonekey = false;
50
51 return (iszonekey);
52}
53
